venue.address_2: (Parking Lot is just down the hill from intersection of Main St. & Valerie Court)
venue.name: Lake Wintergreen @ West Rock Ridge State Park

item.description:
Hi folks! Hope you can join us for a short hike through the woods -- a walk paced for the average person. Don't let the cold keep you indoors -- or away from the warmth of friendly conversation! This Meetup will take place at West Rock, which is a Connecticut State Park located in New Haven and Hamden. Snow is no deterrent, barring treacherous driving conditions!!

$2 DONATION: Please contribute a minimum donation of two dollars towards the fee that is charged by the Meetup Website.  Please email organizer directly and in advance if you have questions or concerns regarding this suggested donation.  Please also note that members who arrive without donations for any reason have always been welcomed with warmth and without question.

WHEN AND WHERE: As usual, plan to arrive five minutes early.

There are various entrances to the park, but we will be parking at Lake Wintergreen. Meet in the parking area at 11:55 or 12:00 and head out at five after.

DIRECTIONS: DO NOT use the directions from the park website. Please use Google Maps (or, your GPS) to find the intersection of Main Street and Valerie Court in Hamden -- this is the closest possible intersection that is actually listed on Google Maps, as the lot itself is NOT listed. From Main and Valerie, drive DOWNHILL on Main Street and you will see the parking area at the bottom of the hill, where Main Street bends to the right.
item.how_to_find_us: Sarah (Organizer) will meet you in the parking area.

group.name: New Haven Walks in the Woods

item.name: Walk at West Rock (Lake Wintergreen)
